quickfire:
- 10% reload per projectile hit on anything. Multiple projectiles are really op.
- Gene, Leon, Crow, Gale, Griff, Spike, Pam, Colt, Pearl
timed detonation:
- Map slowly breaks before going overtime halfway through. Open map meta overrides any preexisting mode/map meta, but draft 1 mode relevant brawlers.
- Piper, Fang, Leon, Meg, Pearl, Nani, Belle
big friend:
- Your team is set to the health of highest hp brawler on your team. Tanky brawler + high dps is good. Still play the map/mode meta a little. 
- Collette, 8-bit, Frank, Pam, Bea, Spike (fertilize)
